The video was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been viewed over 331,000 times and shared over 8,700 times.
The video features Dr: Pornthep Siriwanarangsan, the former director-general of Thailand's Department of Disease Control, claiming that eating papaya salad can protect against COVID-19 infection.
Dr: Thira Woratanarat, an associate professor at Thailand's Chulalongkorn University, refutes the claim, stating that there is no evidence supporting the efficacy of eating papaya salad or any other food to prevent or cure viral infections. He emphasizes that basic hand and respiratory hygiene, wearing masks, and maintaining social distance are the most effective ways to protect against infection.
